Table of Contents

Namespace Vts.MonteCarlo.Rng

Classes

DynamicCreatorMersenneTwister

This class creates a parallelizable representation of the Mersenne Twister class. Code from Dynamic Creator (dc) Home Page http://www.math.sci.hiroshima-u.ac.jp/~m-mat/MT/DC/dc.html or GitHub: https://github.com/MersenneTwister-Lab/dcmt (same code both places) The code is in C, so this code maintained many of the constructs and coding statements to be able to produce same results

MersenneTwisterSerializationInfo

Represents the data required for serializing and deserializing a Mersenne Twister random number generator

SerializableMersenneTwister

This class creates a serializable representation of the Mersenne Twister class. Code from MathNet Numerics.

Structs

DynamicCreatorMersenneTwister.mt_struct

Mersenne Twister structure
